titleStmt.title: An Act for raising seven-score thousand pounds, for the compleat disbanding of the whole Army, and paying off some part of the Navy
Public General Acts. 1660. 12 Car.II.c.20.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Bill, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Caption title, A2r; at head: Anno XII. Caroli II. Regis.

Imprint from general title page, which reads "Anno regni Caroli IJ. Regis Angliæ, Scotiæ, Franciæ, & Hiberniæ, duodecimo. At the Parliament begun at Westminster the five and twentieth day of April, an. Dom. 1660. ..".
Last word of first line of text: "in"; first word of line below initial: "purposes"; last word of last full line on page: "pounds".
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
